Package it.polimi.softeng.model.ReducedModel

Class ReducedGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.model.ReducedModel.ReducedGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ReducedGame extends Object implements Serializable
This class is part of the reduced model and represents its game

  • Constructor Details

    • ReducedGame

      public ReducedGame(Game game, TurnManager turnManager)
      This is the constructor. It initializes a reduced version of a Game.
      Parameters:
      game - the game that will get reduced
      turnManager - the TurnManager of the game
